solid.$description: Solid border style. DEFAULT for all standard borders.

dashed.$description: Dashed border style. Use for: drop zones, placeholder elements.

dotted.$description: Dotted border style. Use for: decorative elements.

0.$description: No border (0px). Use for: removing inherited borders.

100.$description: Thin border (1px). DEFAULT for most UI borders.

200.$description: Medium border (2px). Use for: emphasis, active states.

400.$description: Thick border (4px). Use for: strong emphasis.
